headline: Here’s Which Company Wins the Race to $10 Trillion
summary: The race to $10 trillion isn’t about quarterly earnings. It’s about sustaining explosive growth at nation-scale operations. headline: Winning Stocks Keep Winning, And That’s What iShares TOPT ETF Let’s You Bet On
summary: Market concentration has reached levels not seen in decades. The three largest U.S. stocks now represent over 20% of the S&P 500’s total value, and the top 20 account for roughly half. iShares Top 20 U.S. Stocks ETF (NYSEARCA:TOPT) offers a direct bet that this ‘winners keep winning’ trend will continue. The Portfolio Role: Concentrated ... Winning Stocks Keep Winning, And That’s What iShares TOPT ETF Let’s You Bet On

headline: Meta (META) Stock Pops Following Metaverse Cuts Announcement – Could it Hit $1,000 In 2026?
summary: Summary: Meta Platforms (Nasdaq: META) has faced criticism for investing too heavily in the Metaverse, but the company’s broader business has continued to perform well. During a recent episode of The AI Investor Podcast, 24/7 Analysts Eric Bleeker and Austin Smith discussed whether the announced cutbacks on the Metaverse could help generate even greater returns ... headline: Corporate America is scrambling to hire energy traders as the AI boom pressures electricity costs
summary: As the race for AI development booms, demand for power has soared and is expected to grow in the US at a rate five to 10 times faster over the next 10 years than in the previous decade.
